body.name: Sony RM-IP500/1 Professional Remote Controller, 3 x Sony SRG-X120 1080p PTZ Camera with HDMI, IP & 3G-SDI Output, Sony SRGL-4K 4K License, 3X Cat5e Ethernet Cable, Cleaning Set, 3X HDMI Cable
body.stockDetail: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 5 hrs 26 mins.
features: Bundle Includes: 1 - Sony RM-IP500/1 Professional Remote Controller for Select Sony PTZ Cameras, 3 - Sony SRG-X120 1080p PTZ Camera with HDMI, IP & 3G-SDI Output (White), 3 - Sony SRGL-4K 4K License Included, 3 - Cat5e Ethernet Cable, 1 - Cleaning Set, 3 - HDMI Cable

MULTIPURPOSE: The SRG-X120 PTZ camera, with its remote control feature, is perfect for various settings, including classrooms, meeting rooms, and medical facilities. Its 1/2.5-type Exmor R CMOS sensor delivers high-resolution images marked by outstanding sensitivity, minimal noise, and vibrant, lifelike colors. This is further enhanced by the built-in 12x zoom lens that provides a broad approx. 70° wide-angle view, ensuring every perspective is captured.

Capture stunning images even in low-light conditions with the highly sensitive 1/2.5-type Exmor R sensor, which ensures minimal noise interference. The camera is perfect for lecture capture, especially when used in tandem with the AI-powered REA-C1000 Edge Analytics Appliance. This combination allows for seamless tracking of the speaker’s movements and automatic creation of a cut-out image of the speaker.

NDI|HX SUPPORT: The system can be integrated into cost-effective school studio setups through its compatibility with NDI|HX, which is available via an optional license. This allows for a flexible configuration with other devices on the network that are NDI-enabled. REMOTE ACCESS: The system supports RTSP and allows for remote viewing of images over the Internet using a web browser.

FAST, FUSS-FREE SET-UP - The new Picture Setting File function can apply the same camera settings among multiple cameras for fast set-up. Key Features: Up to 1920 x 1080 Resolution at 60 fps | 1/2.5" Exmor R CMOS Sensor |3G-SDI, HDMI and Ethernet Output. THE SONY RM-IP500/1 REMOTE - This unit incorporates a joystick for pan, tilt, and zoom control, and has the capability of controlling up to 100 separate cameras over IP.
body.description: The Sony SRG-X120 1080p PTZ Camera is designed to record every perspective in meetings and lectures. This camera, straight out of the box, is capable of recording video at a resolution of up to 1920 x 1080 at 60 frames per second. An optional license is available for those who wish to enhance the camera’s performance to UHD 4K 3840 x 2160. The camera features an 8.3MP CMOS sensor and a 4.4-52.8mm lens, providing a field of view of up to 70 degrees. The 12x optical zoom can be extended up to 40x with Clear Image Zoom Technology, enabling close-ups that fill the frame in Full HD.Manufacturer Included Items:Sony SRG-X120 1080p PTZ Camera with HDMI, IP & 3G-SDI Output (White, 4K Upgradable) Sony SRGL-4K 4K License IncludedAC Power AdapterIR Remote Commander2 x Ceiling BracketsWire Rope8 x M3x8 Mounting ScrewsM2.6x6 ScrewHDMI Cable ClampIncluded Items1 x Sony RM-IP500/1 Professional Remote Controller for Select Sony PTZ Cameras3 x Sony SRG-X120 1080p PTZ Camera with HDMI, IP & 3G-SDI Output (White)3 x Cat5e Ethernet Cable 1 x Cleaning Set3 x HDMI Cable
